00032 /*-------- Obit: Merx mollis mortibus nuper ------------------*/
00040 /*-------------------------- Macroes  -----------------------------------*/
00042 #ifndef DG2RAD  
00043 #define DG2RAD G_PI / 180.0
00044 #endif
00045 
00047 #ifndef RAD2DG  
00048 #define RAD2DG 180.0 / G_PI
00049 #endif
00050 
00052 #ifndef RAD2AS  
00053 #define RAD2AS 3600.0 * RAD2DG
00054 #endif
00055 
00057 #ifndef AS2RAD  
00058 #define AS2RAD DG2RAD / 3600.0
00059 #endif
00060 /*-------------- type definitions----------------------------------*/
00062 /* if sizeof (gint32) == sizeof (gfloat) */
00063 typedef gint32 oint;
00064 
00065 /* if sizeof(glong) == sizeof(gfloat)
00066    typedef glong oint;*/
00067 
00069 typedef gint32 olong;
00070 
00072 typedef gfloat ofloat;
00073 
00074 
00076 typedef gdouble odouble;
00077

00082     olong   otg;
00083     oint    itg;
00084     ofloat  flt;
00085     odouble dbl;
00086   };
